headline: 2025-10-28 — Research team (arXiv energy-systems paper) introduced 1 generalized interaction variable (1 variable) that captures instantaneous power and generalized reactive power (evidence: "generalizes the notion of interaction variable... captures aggregate system-wide effects... instantaneous power and generalized reactive power").

2025-10-29 — The same energy-systems authors implemented the lower-layer control command using 2 control methods (2 control methods: Feedback Linearizing Control (FBLC) and Sliding Mode Control (SMC)) (evidence: "This command is implemented using either Feedback Linearizing Control (FBLC) or Sliding Mode Control (SMC)").

2025-10-30 — Energy-systems authors used 1 simplified RLC circuit (1 circuit) with a controllable voltage source as an illustrative model for the proposed design (evidence: "we utilize a simple RLC circuit with a controllable voltage source for illustrations").
